meanings.sent1: The young theorist enjoyed coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent2: The scientist was known as a brilliant theorist in the field of physics.

meanings.definition: A person who is an expert in or student of theories.
meanings.sent1: The history theorist studied ancient civilizations and their beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The literary theorist analyzed the symbolism in the novel.
meanings.sent3: The theorist found humor in the complexities of philosophical debates.
meanings.sent4: She was a theorist of human behavior, always seeking to understand motivations.
meanings.sent5: The music theorist could identify any chord just by listening.
